task_prompt:
You are testing the calendar MCP server. IMPORTANT: First use toolbelt_list_tools to discover available tools, then use toolbelt_add_tool to add each tool before using it.

You MUST execute ALL 4 steps below in order. Do NOT skip any step. Do NOT call final_answer until ALL 4 steps are complete:

Step 1: Call list_events to see all existing events.
Step 2: Call create_event with title='Smoke Test', start_time='2025-03-15T10:00:00', end_time='2025-03-15T11:00:00'. Save the returned event_id.
Step 3: Call read_event with the event_id returned from Step 2. This step is REQUIRED.
Step 4: Call delete_event with the same event_id to clean up. This step is REQUIRED.

Only after completing all 4 steps, report results from each call.
